title: 6 6 6 "The Beast Breaker""Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!"Transliteration: "Zettai Zetsumei! Mōjūtsukai Mōji VS Rufi!" (Japanese:絶体絶命!猛獣使いモージvsルフィ!) Shigeyasu Yamauchi Mitsuru Shimada 112.3 December 29, 1999(1999-12-29)[15] October 23, 2004[16]
transformers_text: 6 6 6 The Beast Breaker Desperate Situation Beast Tamer Moh ji vs Luffy Transliteration Z etta i Ze tsu mei M j tsukai M ji VS Ru fi Japanese vs Shi gey as u Yamauchi Mitsuru Shimada 112 3 December 29 1999 1999 12 29 15 October 23 2004 16 Still trapped in the cage Luffy meets a small dog named Chou chou guarding his master's store despite knowing that his owner is dead Moh ji the Beast Tamer's lion Ritchie inadvertently breaks Luffy's cage open and sends him flying Chou chou tries to protect the store but is no match for the much stronger Ritchie and Moh ji burns the store down Angered by Moh ji destroying what the dog finds precious Luffy mercilessly punches him out Moved by Luffy's concern for the dog Nami agrees to work with Luffy for the time being
